runs.comm: hits a good length and it's bowled in the channel outside off, moves away, leaves it alone
pitched on a good length outside off and finds some movement again, Fletcher opts to leave it be
in the corridor once again and getting the away movement once more, Fletcher lets it go for the third straight time
charges down the track, Praveen alters his line, lands it slightly short on middle, Fletcher can only check his shot and defend it back to the bowler
swing for Praveen, dips in and catches Fletcher on the thigh as he tries to turn it into the leg side
maiden to begin with, away swing this time, full outside off, Fletcher moves across slightly and pushes it to point
turning in sharply from outside off towards leg, Simmons comes forward and plays slightly outside the line, is struck on the thigh
slightly short on the off, turns in, gets on the back foot and knocks it down into the leg side
called a wide, West Indies open their account, turns in from middle and goes down leg
Simmons shaped up for the big sweep there but was surprised by the turn and had to check his shot, offered the face instead
goes for the sweep this time does Phil's nephew, swept straight to square leg, a slight fumble allows them to sneak a single
no bat-pad, gets forward as it turns in with some delicious bounce, catches the glove and then the pad and drops into the leg side
slightly quicker through the air, shortish, gets back and rolls it towards leg slip
the bottom-hand comes off as he tries to swing it away, landed on a length, tried to smote it over midwicket, didn't get hold but picked up a couple as it landed in the gap
short of a good length, nipping away, gets behind it this time and guides it down to third man
missed run-out, looked close, chopped towards point, Kohli picked it and aimed at the stumps at the non-striker's end, missed and Fletcher would have been out had that hit
an ugly shot but effective, short outside off, made a bit of room and slapped it past extra cover, sped away through the gap
short of a good length, gets on the back foot and defends it to extra cover, there is time to sneak through for a quick single
full on middle, pushed wide of mid-on for one more
short of a good length outside off, makes room and chops it into the off side
turning down leg, called a wide
shortish outside off, knocked down into the off side towards point
had made up his mind, pushed it fuller did Ashwin, made a bit of room and smacked it hard over the bowler's head, went all the way
fortunate there as he failed to pick the carrom ball, closed the face early, got the leading edge and it went past slip and short third, three more

given, was the conventional offspinner, Ashwin dropped it short, holding back the length, turned in sharply, Simmons was clearly cramped for room as it spun big, did he get an inside edge? It popped off Parthiv's gloves and Kohli took it off the ricochet at slip. Replays show it struck Parthiv's helmet. We don't really know if there was an inside edge, but even if there was one, that cannot be given out since the ball made contact with the fielder/keeper's helmet before being caught. Fletcher spoke to the umpire about that, but a replay wasn't called for. The original decision has been upheld and Simmons had to go. Replays again show that there was no contact with the bat either. It came off the thigh. A poor decision in the end
slower one bowled slightly short outside off, pushed into the off side
bowled'im! Full and straight on the off stump, a yorker, Fletcher had made room and didn't get his bat down in time, it crashed into off
good length on the off stump, pushed it straight back to the bowler
a lovely straight drive, bowled it full on middle, it was in the slot and he drove it back with a full face down the ground, superb shot
short of a good length on the off, knocked it down in front of point
good length and Samuels thwacks it over extra cover, played it on the rise and cleared the in-field comfortably, good confident start for the man
shortish outside off from round the wicket, punched towards extra cover
angling in and then getting it to spit away, Bravo was too late on that one, closed the face and was beaten
pushed it straight, punched off the back foot towards the bowler
bowled it short outside off, slapped it hard to extra cover, good fielding in the end despite conceding a single, it was struck fiercely
short of a good length, waits for it to turn in and defends it into the off side
the carrom ball from Ashwin, pitched outside leg and came in, Samuels just padded it away
short of a good length on the off, slapped towards deep cover for a single
quicker through the air, shortish outside off, played wide of point for a single
slightly short outside off, waits for it to turn away and cuts it past point for a couple of runs
floating it on the off stump, turns away to beat Bravo as he defends inside the line
appeal for run-out, tossed up on the leg stump, turned it wide of the bowler, Bravo just manages to make it back as Harbhajan gathers and throws down the stumps at the non-striker's end
flighted outside off, drops it wide of Munaf at short third for a single to keep strike
flat and closer to the off stump, driven down towards long-off for a single
short on the off, cracked off the back foot to deep cover for one more
turns in, gets back and knocks it down in front of Kohli at point for one more
shortish on the off, punched back to the bowler from the crease
darts it towards the off stump, Bravo gets forward and defends it to point
slightly short on leg stump, tries to tickle it square but it deflects off the pads
slightly short outside off, nudged into the off side behind point for a single
short of a good length on middle, turns away and Bravo thumps it wide of long-off, they think of a second but it's not there, the batsmen hadn't prepared for it
poor delivery, short ball down the leg side and Samuels moves across to help it on its way to the fine-leg boundary
gets on the back foot and turns it behind square for a single
stopped on him a little there, shortish and spun away sharply, Bravo had made room to cut but ended up miscuing it over extra cover
Munaf had given up on that one, cut it past him at short third, deep point ran across and cut it off, two more
stopped on him again, Bravo rocked back to punch it past the bowler but got it high on the bat, landed just short of Yusuf
gets back and cracks it wide of point for a single
short of a good length, defended in front of point for a quick single
Bravo came down the track and Yusuf pushed that flat on middle, defended back to the bowler
Bravo was caught in two minds, came forward but then retreated as Yusuf bowled it full, defended into the off side
Bravo struggling to get it away, came down and knocked it back to the bowler, good tight stuff from India
good length on the pads, flicked towards deep square leg for a single
slower one bowled short on the off, cuts it down to point
full toss on the off, punched down the ground wide of Yusuf at long-off for a couple of runs, a tumbling save in the end
found the gap, Munaf dropped it short on the off and Bravo seized the length early, pulled it hard over midwicket for a one bounce four

well fielded by Munaf, was driven to his right and he clasped it with one hand and aimed at the striker's end, missed but it seemed Bravo was in...Hmm, not quite, was a missed run-out, as replays show he would have been caught just short
slower one bowled short, slapped it to long-on for a single
shortish on the off, punched it past cover for a single into the deep
flighted on middle, Samuels drives it back straight to Ashwin
slightly short outside off, drops it in front of short third, there isn't a single on offer
flighted on middle, driven wide of midwicket, Raina covers good ground and prevents the single
quicker through the air, held back the length, played it back to Ashwin
lot of wrist involved in that delivery, tries to close the face, clips hte pads and they sneak a single
full toss on middle, punched down the ground to long-on for a single
third man is up, Bravo played that smartly, was bowled full outside off and he squeezed it past that fielder inside the circle for a much-needed boundary
bowled full outside off, dug out towards point where Kohli collects and scores a direct hit with an under-arm flick
and again, full delivery outside off, almost yorker length, dug out to Kohli
mid-on is up, well fielded by Dhawan there, was a full toss and Bravo mistimed that as he tried to get it past him on the on side, has to just settle for a single in the end
a low full toss on the off, cracked to long-off, just the one
bowled it flat and quick on the off, defended in front of the bowler
more dot balls, short of a good length, tries to force it through the leg side, can only find midwicket
punched off the back foot past cover for a single
came down the track and Yusuf saw that, bowled it a little wide of off stump, he plays it down to short third for a single
short on middle, pulled straight to deep square leg for a single
full on middle, comes down the track and drives it wide of long-on for just a single
full toss and he shapes up for the pull, doesn't quite middle it, played just wide of deep midwicket for a couple of runs
two more low full toss outside leg, doesn;t quite get hold of it as he tries to clip it to the fine-leg boundary, just two more
low full toss and he makes sure he deals with it appropriately, thumped past midwicket for a boundary, struck hard and into the gap
slower one bowled on a good length outside off, was the offcutter, Bravo was into the shot a little too early, missed
poor line from Praveen, full and down the leg side, flicked away comfortably to the fine-leg boundary
in the blockhole on the off this time, digs it out back to the bowler
short on the off, waits for it to turn in and pulls it to deep midwicket on the bounce for a single
shortish outside off, slapped wide of extra cover but there's only a single available, Harbhajan fails to gather the throw but there's no damage done
fires it down the leg side, Samuels was trying to pick it over short fine

Harbhajan gave that one a bit of air and held back the pace, Samuels had made his mind up, went for the slog-sweep, trying to clear deep square leg, got a top edge and Parthiv kept his eyes on it to take a well-judged catch
well swept by Bravo, fetched it from the off stump and creamed it past square leg to the boundary, powerfully struck
West Indies slipping further, was in the slot outside off, went for the slog-sweep, was targeting cow corner, ended up getting an inside edge straight onto the stumps
pitched outside leg, Sammy went back to work it square, was struck on the pads, hopeless appeal from Bhajji
Praveen's aiming at the blockhole, bowled it full on middle, pushed it wide of the bowler for a single
Sammy's holed out, was the slower one from Praveen and he swings it straight into the palms of Kohli at long-on, no hope from here on
full on the off, driven down towards long-off for a single
full on middle, gets across and drives it to deep midwicket for a single
the legcutter, shortish on the off, chops it to short third man for a single
full on middle, swung away on the bounce to deep midwicket for a single
bowls it full and wide down the leg side, Barnwell gets some bat on it as he tries to sweep it down fine, gets it past short fine leg
appeal for lbw, the carrom ball, landed outside leg and turned in as he went for the sweep, struck on the pads, struck in line but it landed marginally outside leg stump
flicked uppishly wide of square leg for a brace
that's disappeared, flighted, bowled full on middle, gets forward, bends low and dispatches it over deep midwicket for a massive six

Barnell's indulging in some powerplay here, he can clear it big time, flighted and full on middle, he launches into that one, sending it miles over the long-on boundary. Suddenly, there's some pressure on Ashwin
the carrom ball again bowled slightly quicker, Barnwell had already turned the face on it and it spun past him, still squeezed a leg bye in the end to retain strike
it won't be if he continues like that for a short while more, a juicy full toss on middle, Barnwell stays his ground and hammers it over deep midwicket, Chris Gayle's on his feet in the stands
change in pace and Barnwell misses out there, tries to swing it away again but was into the shot too early, made no contact
short of a good length, was targeting midwicket, slapped it straight back to the bowler, Munaf fielded well and could have run out the non-striker there but opted not to
cracks it wide of Kohli at long-on, Barnwell runs back quickly to complete the second in time despite a good throw from the deep
Barnwell hasn't given up, he's striking them well, short ball bowled slow on middle, pulled away fiercely for a one bounce four over square leg
Barnwell will feel he missed out there, a poor delivery on the pads, a full toss, he could have flicked it past short fine but only managed a leg-bye in the end
just the single, mistimed it, was trying to clear deep midwicket but it got to that fielder on the bounce
short on the off, Hyatt's turn this time, waited for it to turn in and pulled it hard over midwicket for a boundary
swept hard and on the bounce towards deep square leg for a single
makes a bit of room and Yusuf chases him, cracks it towards Kohli at long-on on the bounce
some late entertainment for the crowd here, Hyatt gets stuck into that length delivery, sending it into the stands behind long-on
fires it short on leg stump, misses out on the pull and is struck high on the thighs, a leg bye and the end of the game
